headline: Is It Worth Investing in Aptiv (APTV) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Aptiv (APTV). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?

headline: Tax-Loss Stocks To Sell Before Everyone Else Does
summary: Prepare for tax-loss selling at year-end by considering selling underperforming stocks like Celanese, Walgreens, and Intel. Explore more details here.
